TopicTitle: NullReferenceException spam in main menu, scenarios, and runway

Articles.Content:
Hello. I'm getting these NullReferenceException errors in main menu, whenever i try to launch scenarios, it won't load and it gives me these errors.

Maybe I can just ignore them and play, but when i try to launch directly from the airfield(not from the SPH) it displays these messages and won't load the craft.

Here's my Player.log and list of the mods.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/cctd5dlak7m86lb/Player.log?dl=0

Any suggestions on which mods could possibly bring these issues? I don't have all the time for removing the mods one by one and doing it.

Maybe if no one has clue on this error i'll try removing half and half... Still, i would like to get some help on this.

Thank you.

p.s. and does anyone have idea why im getting those scatterer error messages in console on main menu? Do they not matter?
I fixed it. It was Atmosphere Autopilot mod. Don't know what's causing it but it seems like others are having problem to.
